currentState.description: This score represents the overall condition based on heart rate, activity, and environmental factors. Green indicates stable, yellow attentive, red overloaded.

activities.label: Calm reading activity
activities.description: Child engaged in quiet reading with steady heart rate and no environmental triggers.

activities.label: Moderate activity, sound reaction
activities.description: Brief increase in activity level detected, possibly due to nearby conversation. Heart rate elevated slightly.

activities.label: Rest period
activities.description: Child resting quietly with stable vital signs.

recommendations.text: A calm walk in the garden helped reduce stress earlier today.
recommendations.explanation: Based on observed patterns, outdoor activities with minimal stimulation have consistently lowered stress levels by 20-30%.

recommendations.text: Short rest periods appear beneficial before transitions.
recommendations.explanation: Data shows that 5-10 minute breaks before changing activities correlate with lower stress spikes.

recommendations.text: Noise sensitivity detected â€” consider quieter environments.
recommendations.explanation: Environmental sensors have noted increased heart rate responses to sounds above 60dB in the last week.

alerts.message: Sustained moderate stress levels detected over the last hour. Consider a calming activity.
